content: S-SY NS Nut setter Customized nut setter for Hilti decking screw fastening systems ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Inserts- - ### FEATURES:Features Designed for use with Hilti SDT stand-up handles for superior service life Perfect-fit geometry for greater driving grip when used with Hilti collated metal construction screws Shock-resistant tool steel helps reduces the risk of premature breakage 1/4 hexagon drive Applications Nut setter for use with hexagonal head screws, e.g. metal construction screws and self-drilling screws For use with the SDT stand-up handle For use with the stand-up tool with collated screws for fast, convenient fastening, e.g. in decking applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: Length: 20.9 in Connection end: 1/4 in Hex shank Technical Data | Connection end | 1/4 in Hex shank ### ITEMS- 2039260 - Integrated driver and setter SDT 5/16 - Package Size 1 pc
tag_description: Customized nut setter for Hilti decking screw fastening systems
